Line6.B67DA: I don’t have a solution for the corpses. I just want a quiet shift. If you can give me that, I’ll give you half my pay.
VoiceDir1.B67DA: Young. Way over his head. Frustrated. Complaining, but not annoying.
Line1.B67DA: I have the worst luck. We cast lots for this shift and I lost again! Barely made it back alive last time. The pay is high, but what good is coin if the undead make a meal of me?
